content:
I do not have personal experiences or favorite snorkeling spots. however, based on popular opinions and reviews, some of the most highly-rated snorkeling spots in the caribbean are:
 
1. trunk bay, st. john, us virgin islands
  
2. stingray city, grand cayman, cayman islands
 
3. buck island, st. croix, us virgin islands
 
4. tulum, mexico
 
5. grand turk island, turks and caicos
 
6. playa paraiso, riviera maya, mexico
 
7. rose island, bahamas.
 
keep in mind that the quality of snorkeling can vary depending on the day, weather conditions, and time of year, so it's best to do some research and check conditions before planning a trip.
